scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures in an outdoor setting beneath a large, leafy tree. In the foreground, a woman in a dark, flowing gown stands with her hand held by a man wearing a hooded cloak and tunic. To the left of the woman are two other women, also in dark attire. To the right of the man, a figure in a dark robe kneels before a cow and a donkey. In the background, rolling hills are visible, and a distant cityscape with numerous buildings and spires suggests a town or city.
